name: my second uni project game
description:
hi if you saw my 2d one then you'll know that it's clearly made by a student who's barely touched this sort of thing before. this is like that but worse because at least with 2d i had some experience but... with this... my lord.

you cannot quit the game. you are stuck here forever. you are stuck in the project i rushed with another bad project forever. jk just open your task manager or something i dunno

download if you haven't been disappointed in a while and miss the feeling
